1575310.name: Rotego
1575310.description: A puzzle platformer where you must tether to finish! Hold space while jumping to shoot out a tether, which will shift the gravity towards any surface it connects with. Earn XP and cash by completing achievements, which can then be used to purchase powers. Levels are randomly generated and the game continues endlessly.. though a 'Final Enemy' will appear and harass you from time to time until they are beaten.
1575310.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
